item.description:
An ongoing d20 Modern Game that was in Narragansett, but has moved to West Warwick. Please make a note of the new address!!!

First level characters, using the Urban Arcana setting for the game.
New players are welcome, please RSVP.

Starting about 6-ish, will order food, recap, etc.

Time to dust this off and start it up again! I finally have a decent sized kitchen table to be able to play.
item.name: D20 Modern Game
